captions.text: Aww, man I was gonna eat that.

- Well I had to finish
him before he turned.
- Well what am I gonna do now?
- I don't know, there's some girl scouts

- Is there garlic in this?
Yeah, yeah, yeah, okay.
How many millenniums are you gonna make
- I don't understand why I have to lay the
wooden spoons down in the dishwasher.

- Because if you trip
and fall, you'll stake
yourself in the heart and die.
- Who do you wanna eat for dinner?
- Eh, I don't really care. You choose.
- No, I am not playing this game with you
where I list every single kind of person,
and you shoot it all down.
- Well then I don't know what to tell you.

All the way, so the
sunlight doesn't get in
- I vant to suck your blood!

That is not what he
sounds like, and I know,

I've met him.
- Oh, here we go!
- Oh my God, who do you want to eat?
- Who are you more attracted to?
- I'm not attracted to either one of them.

Come on let's go.
- I need like five or ten
- What? I don't have a reflection,

Why are you lying? You
could say if you think

another vampire's
attractive, it's not gonna

hurt my feelings.
- I'm not lying, it's just
that you know, I am with the best
vampire and I don't really, you know,
need to think about the other ones.
- If anyone ever stakes you, I hope that's
- I hope they don't stake me.
